samOptiPro 0.1.0

Plot bottlenecks (targets & families) with AE/CE, total time, and R-hat

Source: R/plots.R
plot_bottlenecks.Rd

Creates only the requested figures (toggles). If a toggle is FALSE, the corresponding figure is neither computed nor saved. ECDF and joint scatter plots are intentionally removed.

Usage

plot_bottlenecks(
  diag_tbl,
  out_dir = "outputs/diagnostics",
  top_k = 20L,
  rhat_ref = 1.05,
  make_time_targets = TRUE,
  make_esss_targets = TRUE,
  make_esss_families = TRUE,
  make_time_families = TRUE,
  make_rhat_hist_targets = TRUE,
  make_rhat_worst_targets = TRUE,
  make_rhat_median_families = TRUE,
  make_hist_ae_families = FALSE,
  make_hist_ce_families = FALSE
)

Arguments

diag_tbl

Data frame with columns (flexible names supported):

  • target (if absent, rownames are used),

  • AE or AE_ESS_per_it (ESS/iter; small = worse),

  • CE or ESS_per_sec or ess_per_s (ESS/s; small = worse),

  • ESS or ess (optional, absolute ESS),

  • time_s (optional; total seconds per target),

  • Rhat (optional),

  • Family (otherwise derived from target prefix before '[').

out_dir

Output directory (created if missing).

top_k

Number of bars to show (worst/top).

rhat_ref

Reference R-hat threshold line (default 1.01).

make_time_targets

Barplot of top targets by total time.

make_esss_targets

Barplot of worst targets by CE (ESS/s).

make_esss_families

Barplot of worst families by median CE.

make_time_families

Barplot of top families by total time.

make_rhat_hist_targets

Histogram of R-hat (targets).

make_rhat_worst_targets

Barplot of worst targets by R-hat.

make_rhat_median_families

Barplot of median R-hat by family.

make_hist_ae_families

Histogram of family medians (AE).

make_hist_ce_families

Histogram of family medians (CE).

Value

(Invisibly) a named list of ggplot objects actually created.
